data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Razgrad, Bulgaria so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Razgrad, Bulgaria

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 109,900 citizens of the the state of Razgrad.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: the state of Razgrad has (about) 2,178 people who know Jesus, 88,353 people who know about him culturally, and 19,369 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, help the 2,178 believers find a person of peace today among the 107,722 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Pomak people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Razgrad.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Razgrad, Bulgaria to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary:
the state of Razgrad, Bulgaria has a population of 109,900.

We estimate Razgrad has 2,178 people who might know Jesus, 88,353 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,369 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 50 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 2,178 believers in Razgrad to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 107,722 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.
